content:
Maxime's strongest attribute is likely his Physical strength. As a Gangrel, he has a natural affinity for physical prowess and his time on the streets has made him tough and resilient.

His weakest attribute is probably his Social skills. Maxime has spent most of his life as a loner and doesn't have much experience with socializing or diplomacy.

Three attributes he is quite good at include:

1. Animalism - Maxime's mastery of this discipline allows him to communicate with and control animals, making him a skilled tracker and hunter.
2. Stealth - Maxime is a master of disguise and is able to move through the city's underworld undetected, gathering information and making deals.
3. Streetwise - Maxime's experience on the streets has given him a deep knowledge of the city's underground and a network of contacts and informants that he can call upon for information or assistance.
